<title level="1" pfs="">[Nok-Nok (Level 5)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2398)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Nok-Nok (Level 5)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2398)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 58</row>

**Perception** +18; (expert) [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Black Adder Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=106) (2 doses), [Bracelet of Dashing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=415), [Cookware](/Equipment.aspx?ID=17), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)_, _+1 [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)_, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [silver religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58), [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (6), [Ventriloquist's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=468), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 66

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_striking kukri_ +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d6+2 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_kukri_ +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +13 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**[Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=41)** <actions string="Reaction" />  

**[Reactive Pursuit](/Feats.aspx?ID=564)** <actions string="Reaction" />  

**Twin Feint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  

**Ancestry Feats**   [Goblin Scuttle](/Feats.aspx?ID=41), [Very Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=46)

**Class Feats**   [Mobility](/Feats.aspx?ID=557), [Reactive Pursuit](/Feats.aspx?ID=564), [Twin Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=552)

**General Feats**   [ Weapon Proficiency](/Feats.aspx?ID=866)

**Skill Feats**   [Cat Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=765), [Experienced Smuggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=779), [Pickpocket](/Feats.aspx?ID=818), [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843), [Student of the Canon](/Feats.aspx?ID=847), [Wary Disarmament](/Feats.aspx?ID=865)

**Class Abilities**   Deny Advantage, Rogue's Racket ([scoundrel](/Rackets.aspx?ID=2)),Sneak Attack 2d6, Surprise Attack, Weapon Tricks

</column>
name: Nok-Nok (Level 5)
